definition: to plan a project/to stand on tiptoe/Taiwan pr. [qi4]/abbr. for 企業|企业[qi3 ye4]
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
abbr. for 外商獨資企業|外商独资企业[wai4 shang1 du2 zi1 qi3 ye4]

pinyin: qi3 ye4 she4 hui4 ze2 ren4
qi3 ye4 guan3 li3 shuo4 shi4
qi3 ye4 lian2 he2 zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: The results have important guiding significance on the production safety of fertilizer-related enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果对相关化肥企业的安全生产有指导意义。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, there are more than 70 Chinese-funded businesses in Brazil and 300 Brazilian-funded businesses in China.
sentences.chinese: 同时，中国在巴西投资兴建了70多家企业。

sentences.english: It is an inevitable choice to develop the strategy of famous brand for an enterprise in the keen market competitions.
sentences.chinese: 实施名牌战略是企业在激烈的市场竞争中的必然选择。

sentences.english: State-owned enterprises are the pillar of the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 国有企业是我国国民经济的支柱。

sentences.english: But we are a very analytically driven business.
sentences.chinese: 我们是不断去分析的企业。

sentences.english: Now the number has reached closely to 250, half of which have direct investment in sino-foreign joint ventures.
sentences.chinese: 其中有半数直接投资于中外合资企业。

sentences.english: Today's companies should think of high-earning singles as a key market.
sentences.chinese: 当今的企业应该把高收入的单身族当成重要的市场。

sentences.english: Strategic communication plays an important role in the implementation of its corporate strategy.
sentences.chinese: 战略沟通在提升企业战略执行力中具有重要作用。

sentences.english: The objective of RMC is to provide a comprehensive process solution for the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: RMC的目标是为企业提供一个完整的过程解决方案。

sentences.english: Most entrepreneurs skirt close to it.
sentences.chinese: 大多数企业家会绕道而行。

sentences.english: Our company is an enterprise which is invested by Hong Kong investor only and manages businesses independently.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是港商独资企业，自主经营进出口业务。

sentences.english: We're finding that businesses who have bedbugs oftentimes will close to remediate the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现，经常闹臭虫的企业得歇业来处理这个问题。

sentences.english: Their children have been nicknamed the "rich second generation".
sentences.chinese: 企业家的孩子也得了外号“富二代”。

sentences.english: The requirements of enterprise establishment are one of the important contents of enterprise organization law.
sentences.chinese: 企业设立条件是企业组织法规范的重要内容之一。

sentences.english: The requirements of enterprise establishment are one of the important contents of enterprise organization law.
sentences.chinese: 企业设立条件是企业组织法规范的重要内容之一。

sentences.english: Capital structure is the core of financial structure.
sentences.chinese: 资本结构是企业财务结构的核心内容。
